FuncDef: This command configures the value that the HDLC TDM DS-0, E-1, E-3, DS-1, or DS-3 interface transmits during idle cycles. For ATM ports/channels/channel-groups, the configuration does not apply and only the no form is accepted.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that 0x7E is used as the idle cycle flag.
Specifies that 0xFF is used as the idle cycle flag.
